name: practical-research-website
description: Practical Research website built with resilient web design principles

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/assets && cp -r assets/* dist/assets/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:html
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
